Installing nvtestÂ¶

nvtest requires Python 3.9+

  1. Clone and install via pip

    git clone git@cee-gitlab.gov:tfuller/nvtest
cd nvtest
pip install .

  2. Check the installation

$ nvtest --version
nvtest 0.1
